profile.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.2.11 Fonts - 6.2.11.6 Character encodings - Symbolic TrueType fonts
profile.description: Symbolic TrueType fonts shall not contain an Encoding entry in the font dictionary
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: Symbolic TrueType fonts shall not contain an Encoding entry in the font dictionary

error.message: A symbolic TrueType font specifies an Encoding entry in its dictionary
